item.title: Checking BPXPRM syntax
item.author: Author
item.description: A handy operator command to check syntax to a BPXPRMxx parm member. After making some mount point changes recenly I issused the command SETOMVS SYNTAXCHECK=(P3) Where P3 is the member in SYS1.PARMLIB that was changed (i.e BPXPRMP3) IBM link BPXPRMxx syntax checking Another useful command D OMVS,MF Will display information about the last 10 or less mount or move failures IBM link Displaying z/OS UNIX Status
